name: SWAYAM KRUSHI
briefDescription: Swayamkrushi, a voluntary organisation located in Secunderabad, Andhra Pradesh, is dedicated to the rehabilitation and integration of adults with developmental disabilities. Established in 1991, it was the only institution of its kind in India and has spearheaded the movement to increase the awareness and inclusion of adults with developmental challenges in the community.The delivery model aims in building and developing a symbiotic relationship with disabled individuals and their immediate community. This has helped bridge the existing social and emotional chasms and has proved to be a big success and the approach is only of its kind in India.We are serving 200 childrens in our organization.http://swayamkrushi-india.org/
